components.name: ConnectionStatusComponent
components.templateData:
<ng-container *ngIf="status$ | async as status">
    <app-status [status]="status"></app-status>
</ng-container>

components.name: ConsolePageComponent
components.templateData:
<app-layout-1col
        [sidebar]="sidebar"
        [title]="title"
        [breadcrumb]="breadcrumb"
        [middle]="middle"
>
</app-layout-1col>

<ng-template #sidebar>
    <app-side-bar [active]="'console'"></app-side-bar>
</ng-template>

<ng-template #title>
    <app-title text="Console"></app-title>
</ng-template>

<ng-template #breadcrumb>
    <app-breadcrumb [breadcrumbs]="breadcrumbs"></app-breadcrumb>
</ng-template>

<ng-template #middle>
    <app-data-source-selection-panel (selected)="selectDataSource($event)"></app-data-source-selection-panel>
    <app-console-panel *ngIf="selectedDataSource" [dataSource]="selectedDataSource"></app-console-panel>
</ng-template>

components.name: ConsolePanelComponent
components.templateData:
• Snippets
  • History {{historyCount()}} 
{{jsonOutput | json}}
{{stackTraceOutput}}

components.name: DashboardPageComponent
components.templateData:
<app-layout-1col
        [sidebar]="sidebar"
        [title]="title"
        [breadcrumb]="breadcrumb"
        [middle]="middle"
>
</app-layout-1col>

<ng-template #sidebar>
    <app-side-bar [active]="'dashboard'"></app-side-bar>
</ng-template>

<ng-template #title>
    <app-title text="Snapshots"></app-title>
</ng-template>

<ng-template #breadcrumb>
    <app-breadcrumb [breadcrumbs]="breadcrumbs"></app-breadcrumb>
</ng-template>

<ng-template #middle>
        <app-snapshot-overview-panel></app-snapshot-overview-panel>
</ng-template>

components.name: NavigationPageComponent
components.templateData:
<app-layout-1col
        [sidebar]="sidebar"
        [title]="title"
        [breadcrumb]="breadcrumb"
        [middle]="middle"
>
</app-layout-1col>

<ng-template #sidebar>
    <app-side-bar [active]="'navigation'"></app-side-bar>
</ng-template>

<ng-template #title>
    <app-title text="Navigation"></app-title>
</ng-template>

<ng-template #breadcrumb>
    <app-breadcrumb [breadcrumbs]="breadcrumbs"></app-breadcrumb>
</ng-template>

<ng-template #middle>
    <app-data-source-selection-panel (selected)="selectDataSource($event)"></app-data-source-selection-panel>
    <app-navigation-panel *ngIf="selectedDataSource" [dataSource]="selectedDataSource"></app-navigation-panel>

</ng-template>
